caption: A man enters the room and touches the teapot on the table. He is accompanied by a lady and a man in a suit. He and the man in the suit sit by the fireplace and engage in conversation, while the lady sits at the table enjoying refreshments. Later, another woman enters the room and seems somewhat surprised to see the people in the room. After some greetings and exchanges in the room, the scene shifts to a vast hall with a throne for a king. People are bustling around in the hall, going about their business. An elderly man with white hair is in conversation with two others, and a man is seated in a red chair in the hall.
